body:
To apply, you will need your:
- biometric residence permit (BRP)
- bank account or ASPEN card details
- Home Office reference number

Applying takes around 10 minutes.
heading: Apply for a refugee integration loan
lede: If you are a refugee or have been given humanitarian protection, you might be able to apply for a loan of up to Â£1000 to help you integrate into UK society.
